full_summary:
# **Elevator Maintenance Services**

## Contract Information

### Solicitation Number

* WS4119286238

### Amendment

* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: 2023-09-19

### Contract Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4119286238
* Reference Number: WS4119286238-Doc4200258852
* Publication Date: 2023-09-07
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-18T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-27
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-11-30
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Procurement Details

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and more...
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Opportunity: None

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting a contract for elevator maintenance services. The contract will begin on September 27th, 2023, and will end on November 30th, 2026. The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price. The site visit will take place on September 27th, 2023, at 10:00 am EDT.

### Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 18th, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* Name: Martin Gauthier
* Email: martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Organization: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17387354?extsite=MTczODczNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
